title: Missing the golden draven icon
body: I bought spirit guard udyr on the 04/07/2016 and got Buccaneer Tristana through the spinning axes chest. However I never received the icon but my friend did. Can I get any help on this?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

You should receive you icon by April 25th. We're still in the process of distributing them! ^-^
